issues.name: Comparing Literals
issues.hint: [b]Problem:[/b] [newLine] You are comparing two texts where the result is always [TRUE]. Consequently, your code inside the [sbi]then[/sbi] block is always executed. [newLine] [newLine] [b]Suggestion for code improvement:[/b] [newLine] Remove the block.

[newLine] [newLine] [b]Suggestion for code improvement:[/b] [newLine] Change the comparison to something meaningful or remove the control structure.

issues.name: Sprite Naming
